summary: This document is an email exchange between Audrey Strauss and an unnamed recipient, likely a prosecutor or team member, regarding the Maxwell and Epstein cases. It expresses support and anticipation for an upcoming bail hearing, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in July 2020.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, offering congratulations and support to a team member working on the Maxwell and Epstein cases, and referencing an upcoming bail hearing.

events.title: Email exchange regarding case support
events.description: Audrey Strauss and an unnamed recipient exchange emails expressing mutual support and anticipation for an upcoming bail hearing in the Maxwell and Epstein cases.

events.title: Upcoming bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The emails reference preparation for a highly anticipated bail hearing, implied to be for Ghislaine Maxwell, described as 'the most popular bail hearing ever held'.

keyFacts: Audrey Strauss, as US Attorney, was actively involved in and supportive of the Maxwell and Epstein cases as of July 2020.
A significant bail hearing, likely for Ghislaine Maxwell, was imminent in July 2020 and was a major focus for the prosecution team.
The document reflects internal team morale and acknowledgment of the high-profile nature of the cases within the US Attorney's Office.
